Package org.xchain.framework.digester

XChain classes used to process xml documents with the Digester.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NewDigesterFilter  
    NewDigesterStrategy  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationRuleSet  
    AnnotationRuleSet.ClassObjectCreateRule
    A create rule that takes the class of the object to create.
    AnnotationRuleSet.CommandPrefixMappingRule  
    AnnotationRuleSet.CommandRegistrationRule
    Registers a command with the inner most catalog tag in the input document.
    AnnotationRuleSet.CommandSetNextRule
    If the object at the top of the stack is an instance of Command and the object above it is an instance of Chain, then this rule adds the command to the chain.
    AnnotationRuleSet.SetCatalogClassLoader  
    AnnotationRuleSet.SetCommandAttributeRule  
    AnnotationRuleSet.UnknownElementRule  
    DigesterFactory  
    DigesterFactory.RootNewDigesterStrategy
    This strategy just creates a new digester.
    DigesterNamespaceContext  
    ExtendedDigester
    A digester that has been extended to pass along LexicalHandler events to a custom lexical handler, if it is set.
    RuleSetRegistry  
    RuleSetRegistryConfigurator  
    RuleSetRegistryConfigurator.RegistrationRuleSet  
    RuleSetRegistryConfigurator.RegistrationRuleSet.LoadRuleSetRegistryRule  
    RuleSetRegistryConfigurator.RegistrationRuleSet.RegisterRuleSetRule  
    SerializationRule  
    XChainConfigRuleSet
    ...
